p: Six climate-sensitive health vulnerability categories of importance for Simcoe Muskoka ( Figure 2) were identified from both national and international literature [ 1, 2, 4] and stakeholder consultation. Climate change projections were used to describe temperature and precipitation changes from the 1990s (baseline timeframe) to projections for the near- (2020s), short- (2050s) and long-term (2080s) futures.
